title: Create Glow Maxing beauty product website with detailed product information

requirements.summary: Create a hero section with Glow Maxing branding, 7-day results tagline, and call-to-action
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays 'Glow Maxing' as the main product name
Clear mention of '7-day results' is visible in the hero area

file_operations.description: Add a Hero section component at the top of the App. The hero should feature the product name 'Glow Maxing', a tagline emphasizing the 7-day results promise, and a prominent call-to-action button. Use the generated hero background image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as the background.

Create a Hero component that displays 'Glow Maxing' as the main heading, includes a compelling tagline highlighting '7-day results', and features a call-to-action button. Apply the hero background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png. Use warm glowing tones and elegant typography consistent with the beauty theme.

requirements.summary: Create a product benefits section showcasing facial glow, blackhead removal, and whitehead removal
acceptanceCriteria: Section clearly lists facial glow enhancement as a key benefit
Benefits are presented with visual appeal and clear descriptions

file_operations.description: Add a ProductBenefits section component after the Hero section to showcase the three key benefits of Glow Maxing.

Create a ProductBenefits component that displays three key benefits: facial glow enhancement, blackhead removal, and whitehead removal. Use the generated benefit icons from frontend/public/assets/generated/glow-icon.dim_128x128.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/blackhead-icon.dim_128x128.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/whitehead-icon.dim_128x128.png. Present each benefit with an icon, heading, and descriptive text in an organized grid or card layout.

requirements.summary: Implement a 7-day results timeline showing effectiveness progression from day 1 to day 7
acceptanceCriteria: Timeline shows clear progression across 7 days
Each day includes description of expected results
Visual presentation makes the timeline easy to follow

file_operations.description: Add a ResultsTimeline section component after the ProductBenefits section to display the 7-day progression.

Create a ResultsTimeline component that visualizes the 7-day effectiveness progression. Display days 1 through 7 with descriptive text for each day's expected results. Use a timeline or stepper design that makes the progression easy to follow. Include the before-and-after comparison image from frontend/public/assets/generated/before-after.dim_1200x600.png to reinforce the transformation narrative.

requirements.summary: Create a comprehensive product details section with ingredients, usage instructions, and specifications
acceptanceCriteria: Presents information in an organized, scannable format

file_operations.description: Add a ProductDetails section component after the ResultsTimeline section to present comprehensive product information.

Create a ProductDetails component that displays comprehensive information about Glow Maxing including ingredients, usage instructions, and product specifications. Use the product packaging image from frontend/public/assets/generated/product-main.dim_800x800.png. Organize the information into clear subsections with headings and scannable content blocks.

requirements.summary: Design a visually cohesive beauty and skincare themed interface with fresh, glowing aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Color scheme evokes freshness, glow, and skincare wellness
Visual style is consistent across all sections

file_operations.description: Update global styles to implement a beauty and skincare themed color scheme using warm glowing tones, soft gradients, and elegant typography. Define CSS custom properties for primary glow colors, soft gradient backgrounds, and premium typography styles that evoke freshness, radiance, and clarity. Ensure the theme is cohesive and applied consistently across all sections.

Extend the Tailwind configuration with custom colors for the beauty theme including warm glow tones, soft gradient utilities, and elegant font families. Define colors that evoke skincare wellness and radiance, ensuring consistency with the global CSS custom properties.
